title: Can I design a website in which pics of women are used? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Farooq from Uzbekistan Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Wa'alaykumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh, I'm a web designer and my question is can I work with hair salons and Use pictures of women whose only hair is uncovered for their website like what do you think? I don't know like to display that Yeah, I mean inside inside what do you think I Am 50-50 honest, okay, so the rule is as Mentioned in chapter 5 in the beginning surah al-ma'idah upon virtue and righteousness and Do not collaborate upon evil or sin and transgression So it is not permissible for me to market someone who uses haram because this means that I endorse the haram if I design a website for a hair saloon of women and I put the pictures of women hair even if it's from the back side and The face of the woman is not appearing isn't this hair awrah isn't it tempting? So it is not permissible for me to endorse them or to market their products Let alone that I know in hair saloons. They have haram Activities as well such as plucking the eyebrows such as whitening the skin such as maybe full body Manicure and and body cure and and and the likes so this is not permissible and Allah knows best
